input_text:
Job Title: Python Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Python Developer - Remote, USA
About Bizcoder:Bizcoder is a cutting-edge software development company that specializes in creating bespoke solutions for businesses across a variety of industries. With a focus on innovation and quality, we aim to deliver software that not only meets but exceeds our clients' expectations. As we continue to grow, we are looking for a skilled Python Developer to join our dynamic team. This full-time, remote position is open to candidates across the United States, offering flexible working hours between 9-5pm or 10-6pm. Bizcoder offers both contract and regular employment options, seeking to find the ideal fit for our team and the successful candidate.
Your Role:As a Python Developer at Bizcoder, you will be instrumental in the development of high-quality, scalable, and innovative software solutions. Your expertise in Python programming will enable you to contribute to a wide range of projects, from web applications to data analysis tools. Working closely with our team of developers, project managers, and stakeholders, you will play a key role in all phases of the software development lifecycle, from concept through to deployment.
Key Responsibilities:Design and develop robust, testable, and efficient software solutions using Python.Contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle, including analysis, design, implementation, testing, and deployment.Write reusable, maintainable, and efficient code.Integrate various data storage solutions.Implement security and data protection best practices.Collaborate with the front-end team to define and implement API services.Stay up-to-date with new technology trends, frameworks, and best practices in Python development
Technical Requirements:Profound knowledge of Python programming language.Experience with Python frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask, Pyramid).Familiarity with ORM (Object Relational Mapping) libraries.Able to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system.Understanding of server-side templating languages.Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments.
Experience:2+ years of professional experience in Python development.Demonstrated experience in developing web applications, APIs, and backend services.Experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and Docker containers is a plus.
Who You Are:A problem solver with excellent analytical skills.Able to work independently, managing your workload effectively in a remote setting.A strong communicator, capable of collaborating with a distributed team.Passionate about technology and staying abreast of the latest trends and best practices in software development.Detail-oriented, with a commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions
Join Us:At Bizcoder, youâ€™ll be part of an innovative team that values creativity, quality, and the impact of technology. Enjoy the flexibility of remote work across the US, with standard working hours that support work-life balance. Here, we believe your skills and passion for Python development are what truly matter.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Python Developer
output_json.summary: A skilled Python Developer is sought by Bizcoder, a software development company specializing in bespoke solutions.
job_responsibilities: Design and develop robust software solutions using Python.
Contribute to all phases of software development lifecycle.
Implement security and data protection best practices.
Collaborate with front-end team on API services.
Stay updated with Python development trends.
output_json.company_information: Bizcoder is a cutting-edge software development company specializing in bespoke solutions.

other.content: Profound knowledge of Python programming language, experience with Python frameworks, familiarity with ORM libraries, ability to integrate data sources, understanding of front-end technologies, proficient understanding of code versioning tools, knowledge of user authentication and authorization.
